title: SplitShare
description: Mobile solution for collaborative financial tracking, allowing groups to divide shared costs efficiently. Offers straightforward tools to log expenditures, calculate individual contributions, and maintain transparent payment records across teams.
detailedDescription:
I developed a collaborative financial tracking app based on groups that allows every member to upload the bill and share that among each other easily. It offers features such as logging expenditures, calculate individual contributions, and maintain payment records across teams. 
Used Android Studio with jetpack navigation, Room database designing and gained experience with livedatas for better state management. Some features includes:- 
▷ Use of Fragments, Viewmodel and repository to ensure functional multi-screen flow. 
▷ Usage of native and memory efficient components such as Recyler views.

title: Cinemarvel Reviews
description: Web platform dedicated to Marvel Cinematic Universe films, featuring authenticated user reviews and ratings. Enables fans to post detailed analyses, read community critiques, and explore aggregated scores for recent superhero releases.
detailedDescription:
I developed a web platform for Marvel movie enthusiasts. Users can interact throught their favourite or critics movie. This enabled fans to watch movie synopsis, community critiques and could view the average ratings for the movie. Some key features include:- 
▷ Use of Bootstrap ensuring mobile-friendly UI.
▷ Secure login and registration. 
▷ Authentic user reviews and rating system. 
▷ MySql based data handling with jquery and Ajax requests

title: Library Management Application
description: A dual-interface desktop application for administrators and patrons. Admins handle book catalogs, author databases, and generate usage reports. Users can browse titles, place reservations, and manage borrowings through an intuitive client interface.

title: React Digital Watch
description: A minimalist web application built with React framework that showcases real-time clock functionality. Continuously updates to display current hours, minutes, and seconds in a clean digital interface optimized for responsive viewing.

title: To do List Application
description: This is a react app which allows users to add, delete and move them up or down based on their priority. It is a simple and easy-to-use application that helps users to keep track of their tasks and manage them efficiently.

title: Scholarlink Application Design
description: A comprehensive UI/UX design project for a digital platform connecting students with academic scholarships based on the prioroties set by the users. Features a user-friendly interface, intuitive navigation, and interactive elements to streamline the scholarship application process.
